definition[0]: to have enough money to buy the things you need, but no more
example[0]: I donâ€™t earn a huge salary, but we get by.
example[1]: Sometimes they had to get by on very little.
definition[1]: to manage to deal with a difficult situation, using whatever money, equipment etc you have
example[2]: The Fed made several changes designed to make it easier for banks to get by on fewer reserves.
example[3]: In Microsoft Windows, you can get by with just 2 megabytes of memory.
